full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement
### RISO for the purchase of Miscellaneous Grocery Products for CSC Housing Units

#### Solicitation Information

| Field | Description |
| --- | --- |
| **Solicitation Number** | WS3697278636 |
| **Publication Date** | October 7, 2022 |
| **Tender Closing Date and Time** | November 3, 2022, 2:00 PM EDT |
| **Contracting Entity** | Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) |
| **End User** | Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) |

#### Tender Details

This Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) seeks the acquisition and delivery of miscellaneous grocery products for CSC's Housing Units. The solicitation covers three regions in the province of Québec, Canada: Laval, Sainte-Anne-des-Plaines, and Cowansville.

#### Goods and Services Requirements

The RFSO requires the supply of various grocery products, including:

* Nuts and seeds
* Minimally processed meat and poultry products
* Organic meat and poultry products
* Processed meat and poultry products
* Fish
* Eggs and egg substitutes
* Milk and butter products
* Cheese
* Herbs and spices and extracts

#### Procurement Method

This solicitation is conducted using a competitive, open bidding process.

#### Trade Agreements

This solicitation applies to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

#### Contact Information

For additional information, please contact:

Anna Caruso, Contract Specialist
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
Phone: None
Email: [anna.caruso@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:anna.caruso@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
